Class ImageQuizController

java.lang.Object
com.quizapp.quiz.backend.controller.ImageQuizController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/imagequiz") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") public class ImageQuizController extends Object
Controller handling the "Image Quiz" game mode (Guess the Game from an image).

Provides endpoints for fetching games, searching titles, and comparing user guesses against correct answers.

Author:
machm

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ImageQuizController.GuessRequest
    Represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for carrying a user's guess and the expected correct answer (or key identifying it) during a game or quiz submission.
    static class 
    ImageQuizController.GuessResponse
    DTO for sending simple boolean guess responses.

  • Method Details

    • getRandomGame

      @GetMapping("/random") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Game> getRandomGame()
      Fetches a random game to display in the quiz.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a Game object if found, or 204 No Content if no games are available.

    • getAllGames

      @GetMapping("/list") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Game>> getAllGames()
      Retrieves the complete list of available games. Useful for debugging or listing all possibilities.
      Returns:
      A list of all Game objects.

    • searchGames

      @GetMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> searchGames(@RequestParam("query") String query)
      Searches for game titles that match a given query string. Used for autocomplete functionality in the frontend.
      Parameters:
      query - The search string provided by the user.
      Returns:
      A list of matching game titles.

    • compare

      @PostMapping("/compare") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ImageQuizService.ComparisonResponse> compare(@RequestBody Map<String,String> body)
      Compares the user's guess with the correct answer.

      This endpoint provides detailed logic (likely fuzzy matching or specific criteria) handled by the ImageQuizService.

      Parameters:
      body - A map containing keys "guess" and "correct".
      Returns:
      A ImageQuizService.ComparisonResponse with details about the accuracy of the guess, or 400 Bad Request if parameters are missing.

    • checkAnswer

      @Deprecated @PostMapping("/check") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> checkAnswer(@RequestBody ImageQuizController.GuessRequest request)
      Deprecated.
      Use compare(Map) for more advanced comparison logic.
      Checks if the user's guess matches the correct answer (Legacy/Simple check).

      This performs a simple case-insensitive string comparison.

      Parameters:
      request - The ImageQuizController.GuessRequest containing the user's guess and the correct answer.
      Returns:
      A ImageQuizController.GuessResponse containing a boolean indicating if the answer was correct.
